title: ebi-metagenomics/miassembler pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

study_accession.errorMessage: Study name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

reads_accession.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

library_layout.errorMessage: library_layout should be only 'single' or 'paired' value

library_strategy.errorMessage: library strategy should be only value from list: 'metagenomic', 'metatranscriptomic', 'genomic', 'transcriptomic', 'other'

assembly_memory.description: Default memory (in GB) allocated for the assembly process for the run.

contaminant_reference.errorMessage: Fasta file prefix to be used as part of the decontamination process, corresponding folder must exist in the reference_genomes_folder

human_reference.errorMessage: Human reference genome prefix to use for decontamination, corresponding folder must exist in the reference_genomes_folder

phix_reference.errorMessage: PhiX reference genome prefix to use for decontamination, corresponding folder must exist in the reference_genomes_folder
